name: Galactic Rodeo
description:
Vaquero intergaláctico vegano gluten-free quiere salvar a las vacas de la galaxia de ser secuestradas por aliens amantes de la leche, para su explotación. En el planeta de los aliens, encuentras la leche como una droga prohibida y muy adictiva.

Our Intergalactic gluten-free Cowboy needs your help to save his galactic cows from the milk loving aliens, who kidnapped them to exploit them. On their alien planet, space milk is a very potent and sought substance that is forbidden because of the addictive properties for their species.
